1.name: Storage temperature
1.desc: [6240] The temperature at which the cargo is to be kept while it is in storage.

2.name: Transport temperature
2.desc: [6242] The temperature at which cargo is to be kept while it is under transport.

3.name: Cargo operating temperature
3.desc: The temperature at which cargo is to be kept during cargo handling.

4.name: Transport emergency temperature
4.desc: The temperature at which emergency procedures apply for the disposal of temperature-controlled goods.

5.name: Transport control temperature
5.desc: The maximum temperature at which certain products can be safely transported.

6.name: Boiling point
6.desc: The temperature at which a liquid begins to boil.
